Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.events.messages.server

Class ServerMessage

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.events.messages.Message
it.polimi.ingsw.events.messages.server.ServerMessage
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
CommonGoalsUpdateMessage, ConnectionConfirmationMessage, DeckUpdateMessage, GameListMessage, GameStatusUpdateMessage, JoinConfirmationMessage, PlayersBoardUpdateMessage, PlayersHandUpdateMessage, PlayersListUpdateMessage, PrivateGoalUpdateMessage, ScoreUpdateMessage, ServerChatMsgMessage, ServerErrorMessage, ServerToClientPingMessage, StartCardUpdateMessage, VisibleCardUpdateMessage
public abstract class ServerMessage extends Message
Abstract message that the Server sends to the Client. Allows to update the client's view.

  • Constructor Details

    • ServerMessage

      public ServerMessage(MessageType messageType, String addresseeIdentifier)
      Builds a ServerMessage with a specified type. The message has a specified recipient.
      Parameters:
      messageType - the type of the message
      addresseeIdentifier - if the message is for a single client only, provide its identifier

  • Method Details

    • getAddresseeIdentifier

      public String getAddresseeIdentifier()
      Retrieves the message addressee's identifier.
      Returns:
      addressee's playerIdentifier, null if the message has no specific addressee

    • updateView

      public abstract void updateView(VirtualView view)
      Updates the View with the content of the message.
      Parameters:
      view - the client's view that needs to be updated.
